text:
mod_rewrite.conf
<Location "/">
					RewriteEngine on
					RewriteCond %{REQUEST_URI} ^/download
					RewriteRule ^(.*)$ /load_file.php 
[L,QSA]
</Location>

Please take this to a user-support forum.

[Clue to get you started: don't put rewriterules inside a <Location>.]
